abstract: home alone : jose mourinho says he is too lazy to buy a house .
article: jose mourinho has urged fans not to mistake his laziness for a lack of commitment to manchester united . the united boss could exit old trafford upon expiry of his contract at the end of next season and is being linked strongly with psg . he moved to quell speculation but a failure to put roots down in the city has given the impression that mourinho does not see himself at united for long . the former chelsea manager has resided at the five star lowry hotel for over a year since getting the job . mourinho 's wife and family still live in london and the united boss says they have no plans to join him in manchester .

mourinho is reportedly living in one of the Â£ 700 per night riverside suites . describing the suites on the website the lowry hotel say : `` they have the feeling of a private apartment with a king or two individual beds offering plenty of space with a separate bedroom , lounge and dining room and kitchenette . `` bathrooms are finished in italian porcelain tiles and glass mosaic detail . all have bath , walk in shower luxurious toiletries , slippers , fluffy bathrobes and towels . `` mourinho reaffirmed his commitment to the cause on thursday amid reports he has begun negotiating a new deal .

the 54-year-old though says he he has no plans to buy a house . he says that is not because of uncertainty surrounding his future , he 's just too lazy to bother house hunting . `` i am very lazy and because i like to arrive in the hotel , i do n't want anyone to be worried because i live in a two square metres room , i am living in an apartment inside of a hotel where i have all the comfort , the support , where i have everything i want , like i am living in a house .

`` so if they are worried about me being comfortable , happy and supported , i really am . that 's the way i feel very comfortable . `` if they want me in some house that i do n't like , in some place i do n't like , lonely from my assistants , if they want that , i would be a sad guy and a sad guy does n't work well .
